objects.description: In 2017, [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) conducted technical research related to vulnerabilities associated with websites used by the Korean Sport and Olympic Committee, a Korean power company, and a Korean airport.(Citation: US District Court Indictment GRU Unit 74455 October 2020)

external_references.description: Scott W. Brady. (2020, October 15). United States vs. Yuriy Sergeyevich Andrienko et al.. Retrieved November 25, 2020.
external_references.source_name: US District Court Indictment GRU Unit 74455 October 2020
